title: FORTINET LAWSUIT ALERT: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Reminds Fortinet, Inc. Investors to Contact the Firm About Their Rights in Class Action Lawsuit
content: A class action lawsuit has been filed against Fortinet alleging misrepresentation of product refresh cycle and firewall upgrade potential, resulting in significant stock price decline after earnings call revelations.
author: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C.

title: Musk Could Spell the End of Big Telecom
content: Starlink, Elon Musk's satellite internet system, is poised to revolutionize global internet access by offering fast, reliable connectivity worldwide, potentially challenging traditional telecom providers and bringing internet to billions of unconnected people.
author: James Altucher

title: Important Notice to Long-Term Shareholders of Elevance Health, Inc. (NYSE: ELV); Humana Inc. (NYSE: HUM); Maison Solutions Inc. (NASDAQ: MSS); and Vestis Corp. (NYSE: VSTS): Grabar Law Office is Investigating Claims on Your Behalf
content: Grabar Law Office is investigating potential securities fraud and fiduciary duty breaches for several companies, including Elevance Health, Humana, Maison Solutions, and Vestis Corp, alleging misleading financial statements and undisclosed material risks.
author: Joshua H. Grabar

title: Experts: Rivian's Sales May Be "Dreadful" in 2026
content: Rivian faces potential demand challenges in 2026 due to the elimination of federal EV tax credits, which could depress sales and make their vehicles less affordable. The company plans to launch its R2 model at around $45,000, potentially mitigating some market challenges.
author: Ryan Vanzo

title: SoFi Stock: Buy or Sell?
content: SoFi stock has experienced significant growth in 2025, with potential for further expansion due to fundamental changes in its risk profile and growth trajectory.
author: Travis Hoium

title: Could First Majestic Silver's $12 Stock Be a Backdoor AI Play?
content: The AI revolution is driving massive demand for silver in nuclear reactors, solar panels, and electric vehicles, creating significant opportunities for silver mining companies like First Majestic Silver.
author: William Dahl

title: Tesla Deliveries Soar in Q3. But What Will Q4 Look Like?
content: Tesla reported a 29% quarter-over-quarter increase in Q3 deliveries, reaching 497,099 vehicles, driven by consumers rushing to purchase before a $7,500 clean-vehicle credit expired. While the surge is impressive, Q4 might see a slowdown, with long-term growth potential tied to more affordable models and autonomous driving technology.
author: Daniel Sparks

title: SHAREHOLDER RIGHTS ALERT: Halper Sadeh LLC Investigates WOW, FCCO, SMLR on Behalf of Shareholders
content: Law firm Halper Sadeh LLC is investigating potential securities law violations and fiduciary duty breaches for several companies involving mergers and sales transactions.
author: Halper Sadeh Llc

content: Law firm Halper Sadeh LLC is investigating potential securities law violations and fiduciary duty breaches for several companies undergoing significant corporate transactions, including ODP Corporation and Air Lease Corporation.
author: Halper Sadeh Llc

title: SHAREHOLDER INVESTIGATION: Halper Sadeh LLC Investigates VECO, BRNS, VRNT on Behalf of Shareholders
content: Law firm Halper Sadeh LLC is investigating potential securities law violations and fiduciary duty breaches for several companies involving mergers and acquisitions.
author: Halper Sadeh Llc

title: SHAREHOLDER INVESTIGATION: Halper Sadeh LLC Investigates PRO, EA, MRUS on Behalf of Shareholders
content: Law firm Halper Sadeh LLC is investigating potential securities law violations and fiduciary duty breaches related to recent corporate sales involving PROS Holdings, Electronic Arts, and Merus N.V.
author: Halper Sadeh Llc

title: Direxion Closing Three ETFs
content: Direxion Shares ETF Trust will liquidate three ETFs (WFH, EVAV, XXCH) due to insufficient investment assets, with trading ceasing on October 23, 2025, and complete liquidation by October 30, 2025.
author: Direxion

title: FCX Investor News: If You Have Suffered Losses in Freeport-McMoRan Inc. (NYSE: FCX), You Are Encouraged to Contact The Rosen Law Firm About Your Rights
content: Rosen Law Firm is investigating potential securities claims for Freeport-McMoRan shareholders following a press release about a fatal mud rush incident at the Grasberg Block Cave mine in Indonesia, which caused the stock to drop 16.95%.
author: Rosen Law Firm

title: My 3 Favorite Stocks to Buy Right Now
content: The article discusses three stocks with potential investment opportunities: Amazon facing cloud computing challenges, Twilio leveraging AI for customer service, and DraftKings maintaining strong market position despite competitive pressures.
author: James Brumley

title: Why's Everyone Talking About Costco Stock?
content: Costco stands out as a unique retailer with a member-first business model, generating significant revenue from membership fees and maintaining high customer loyalty. The company shows strong potential for international expansion and consistent growth, trading at a premium valuation that reflects its robust business strategy.
author: Lawrence Nga

title: 3 Tech Stocks Perfect for Gen Xers to Add to Their Portfolios
content: A Motley Fool analyst recommends three tech stocks for Gen X investors: Meta Platforms, ASML, and CrowdStrike, highlighting their growth potential, market positioning, and future prospects in technology and digital sectors.
author: Leo Sun

title: 2 Dirt Cheap Dividend Stocks to Buy Before It's Too Late
content: The article highlights two dividend stocks trading at significant discounts: Albemarle, a lithium producer with long-term potential in electric vehicle battery markets, and Constellation Brands, a leading beverage company with a strong Mexican beer portfolio.
author: Daniel Miller

title: CHTR LEGAL NOTICE: Charter Communications, Inc. Faces Securities Fraud Class Action due to Customer Decline – Contact BFA Law if You Lost Money
content: Charter Communications faces a securities fraud class action lawsuit after experiencing significant internet customer declines following the end of the Affordable Connectivity Program (ACP), with stock price dropping 18.4% after reporting a loss of 117,000 internet customers in Q2 2025.
author: Bleichmar Fonti & Auld Llp

title: MLTX LEGAL NOTICE: MoonLake Immunotherapeutics Faces Securities Fraud Investigation due to Drug Trial Results – Contact BFA Law if You Lost Money
content: MoonLake Immunotherapeutics experienced a significant stock price drop after reporting disappointing Phase 3 trial results for its investigational drug sonelokimab, leading to a potential securities fraud investigation.
author: Bleichmar Fonti & Auld Llp

title: KMX LEGAL NOTICE: CarMax, Inc. Faces Securities Fraud Investigation due to Demand Issues – Contact BFA Law if You Lost Money
content: CarMax reported significant sales declines in Q2 2025, attributing the drop to a 'pull forward' in demand before tariff announcements, causing its stock price to fall by approximately 20%.
author: Bleichmar Fonti & Auld Llp

title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do, as NASA Kicks Sierra Space to the Curb
content: NASA has effectively reduced support for Sierra Space's Dream Chaser spacecraft after a decade of delays, potentially removing the company from its Commercial Re-Supply mission contract and signaling skepticism about the spacecraft's viability.
author: Rich Smith

title: 3 Reasons to Buy Costco Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
content: Costco continues to demonstrate robust financial performance with rising sales, expanding e-commerce, and strong membership growth, particularly among younger customers. The company's high renewal rates and ability to navigate economic challenges make it an attractive long-term investment.
author: Chris Neiger

title: Why IBM Stock Soared 16% in September
content: IBM experienced significant stock gains in September, driven by breakthroughs in AI and quantum computing, with notable achievements including $7.5 billion in generative AI business and a quantum computing demonstration with HSBC that improved bond trading predictions.
author: Tim Green

title: Dangbei Joins Amazon UK's Prime Big Deal Days with Savings Up to £400
content: Dangbei is offering significant discounts on its range of 4K and portable projectors during Amazon UK's Prime Big Deal Days from October 4-10, 2025, with savings up to £400 on various models.
author: Dangbei Pr Team

title: Monroe® bringt Luftfederreihe für Nutzfahrzeuge auf den Markt
content: Monroe has introduced a new comprehensive range of air springs for commercial vehicles, featuring advanced technical improvements that enhance vehicle safety, performance, and durability across multiple truck and bus manufacturers.
author: Driv (Tenneco)

title: Monroe® lance une gamme de ressorts pneumatiques pour véhicules utilitaires
content: Monroe has introduced a new comprehensive range of high-performance air springs for commercial vehicles, designed to enhance safety, durability, and vehicle productivity across multiple truck and bus manufacturers.
author: Sylvain Gary

title: Should You Buy Wolfspeed Stock Right Now?
content: Wolfspeed emerged from Chapter 11 bankruptcy by reducing debt by 70% and replacing existing stock with new shares, resulting in shareholders receiving only one new share for every 120 previously owned.
author: Johnny Rice

content: Dangbei is offering discounts up to €300 on its range of 4K and portable projectors during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days from October 4-10, 2025, across multiple European markets including Spain, Germany, and France.

title: The Stock Market Is Historically Pricey: Here's 1 Reason Target Is Still a No-Brainer Buy
content: Target's stock has fallen 40% over the past year, but the company is positioning for a potential turnaround with a new CEO and showing signs of improvement in customer traffic.
author: Reuben Gregg Brewer

title: Want to Start Earning More Passive Income in October? Buy This High-Yield Dividend Stock and Never Look Back.
content: Realty Income, a large REIT with over 15,600 properties, offers a stable 5.4% monthly dividend yield with a consistent history of dividend growth, making it an attractive passive income investment option.
author: Matt Dilallo

title: My Top Value Stock to Buy for 2026 (and It's Not Even Close)
content: Rivian is positioned for potential growth in 2026 with plans to launch three affordable SUV electric vehicle models, presenting an attractive investment opportunity after a significant market valuation decline.
author: Ryan Vanzo

title: Shopify and Etsy Just Got a Surprising Boost From ChatGPT
content: OpenAI launched Instant Checkout, a new feature allowing ChatGPT users to purchase products directly from Etsy and soon Shopify, potentially bringing millions of new buyers to these platforms.
author: Jon Quast

title: Nvidia Competitor Cerebras Shelves IPO Plans Days After Touching $8 Billion Valuation
content: AI chipmaker Cerebras Systems has withdrawn its IPO plans shortly after raising $1.1 billion in funding and achieving an $8.1 billion valuation, despite previously filing for an IPO to compete with Nvidia in the AI chip market.
author: Eva Mathew

title: Why Investing $5,000 in Lockheed Martin Stock Today Might Just Be a Brilliant Move
content: Despite a $1.6 billion write-down in Q2, Lockheed Martin remains a strong defense contractor with significant government contracts, consistent dividend growth, and potential for future expansion.
author: Patrick Sanders

title: Skeena Resources Limited Announces the Filing of the Prospectus Supplement in Respect of Its Approximately C$125 Million Bought Deal Financing
content: Skeena Resources Limited has filed a prospectus supplement for a bought deal financing of 5,210,000 common shares at C$24.00 per share, raising approximately C$125 million, with potential additional proceeds through an over-allotment option.
author: Skeena Resources Limited

title: MOH INVESTOR ALERT: Molina Healthcare, Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit - RGRD Law
content: Molina Healthcare faces a class action lawsuit alleging failure to disclose material adverse facts about medical cost trends and financial guidance, resulting in significant stock price decline during February-July 2025.
author: Robbins Geller Rudman & Dowd Llp

title: SACH Pte. Ltd. Announces the Agreement and Plan of Merger with Quantumsphere Acquisition Corporation
content: SACH Pte. Ltd., a Singapore-based technology company, announced a merger with Quantumsphere Acquisition Corporation, a special purpose acquisition company. The transaction values SACH at $300 million and will provide up to $82.8 million in cash proceeds, enabling the company to scale its innovative OMMiii social technology platform.
author: Sach Pte. Ltd.

title: ALT FINAL DEADLINE: ROSEN, A GLOBAL AND LEADING FIRM, Encourages Altimmune, Inc. Investors with Losses in Excess of $50K to Secure Counsel Before Important October 6 Deadline in Securities Class Action – ALT
content: Rosen Law Firm alerts Altimmune investors about a securities class action lawsuit regarding misleading information about the IMPACT Phase 2b MASH trial results, with an October 6, 2025 deadline to join the action.
author: Rosen Law Firm

title: Barkly Launches Innovative Safety Dog Leash Designed to Empower Women on Everyday Walks
content: Barkly, a women-founded pet tech company, introduces a retractable dog leash with integrated personal safety features like a 130-decibel alarm and strobe light, designed to help women feel more secure while walking their dogs.
author: Dr. Holly Jordan And Drew Evenson

title: Mactores Signs Strategic AWS Partnership to Accelerate Enterprise GenAI Adoption by 80%
content: Mactores has signed a Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS and achieved the AWS Generative AI Competency, enabling enterprises to deploy generative AI solutions 80% faster and demonstrating significant ROI across multiple industries.
author: Balkrishna Heroor
